text: The 1972 Volta a Catalunya was the 52nd edition of the Volta a Catalunya cycle race and was held from 12 September to 17 September 1972. The race started in Tremp and finished in Badalona. The race was won by Felice Gimondi. ==General classification== {| |Final general classification {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col" | Rank ! scope="col" | Rider ! scope="col" | Time |- | style="text-align:center;" | 1 | | style="text-align:right;" | |- | style="text-align:center;" | 2 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 7" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 3 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 56" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 4 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 1' 16" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 5 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 1' 27" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 6 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 1' 54" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 7 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 2' 05" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 8 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 2' 18" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 9 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 2' 20" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 10 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 2' 25" |} |} ==References== 1972 Volta Category:1972 in Spanish road cycling Category:September 1972 sports events in Europe
